Changes.Change: If you like our product, please consider buying us a coffee at https://www.buymeacoffee.com/chem4word
Please download Chem4Word-Setup.exe via https://www.chem4word.co.uk/download/ if you encounter any difficulties updating
UX: Add better instructions regarding purchase and download of a library
UX: Allow user to cancel bulk calculate properties of a library
Internal: Replace seed libraries with patched versions
I/O: Remove invalid bond(s) which have the same start and end atoms on import
ACME: Prevent creation of new invalid bond(s) which have the same start and end atoms
Ensure Help button is never disabled.
Add SketchEl file format support.
Add AV Warning
Add missing file to installer
Fix Right Click Convert to chemistry issues
Fix Windows 11 detection issue
Update user manual
Private Beta of Chem4Word 2024 (V3.3)
Users can download extra libraries
Add detection of ReadOnly and System databases, enabling UI buttons as appropriate
Internal: Add better tool tips in ACME
BugFix: Prevent import of structures which have duplicate bonds
Copied changes from V3.2.*
Stability: Improved method to purge old V2 installations to increase system stability
Internal: Update NuGet packages
Internal: Fetch location of web services from our website
Added basic library manager
Add new Plug-In type (Driver) to manage multiple libraries
Add new converter to model which reads/writes byte[] from Google protocol buffer of model
Private Alpha of Chem4Word 2024 (V3.3)
